title: Styling Leather Pants Shouldn’t Be Intimidating—Try These Outfits to Get Started
description: Featuring inspiration from celebrities who wear the trend incredibly well.
excerpt: Featuring inspiration from celebrities who wear the trend incredibly well.
text: Is it a hot take to call leather pants a neutral? Even if that’s an unpopular opinion, I’m willing to defend this point until the bitter end. No capsule wardrobe is complete without a pair, and if you don’t yet own one, I’m positive you will be amazed at how easily it can transform your weekly looks. Paired with a blazer, T-shirt, or even lingerie, I’ve rounded up 11 celebrities as perfect examples of how to style leather pants. Ahead, find all the outfit inspiration—and product recommendations—you need. A White Top GothamWhen in doubt, a white top will always look good with black bottoms. But then again, not any old basics will do. To ensure this doesn’t devolve into a derivative or boring ensemble, look for separates that are luxury-tier quality. Craftsmanship and good design are timeless. Wolford Beauty Cotton Tank TopCommando Faux Leather Flared Leg Pants Golden Goose Debbie Beatles Studded Leather BootsCredit: Moda Operandi, Inc.Balenciaga Genève Large Hobo Bag Now 30% OffLAMARQUE Presley Jacket Ray-Ban Emy Rectangular Sunglasses A Fitted Bodice + Wide-Leg Pant XNY/Star Max Sofía Vergara really did the damn thing here. Immediately, I need a pair of wide-leg leather pants with an elastic waistband for the comfort alone! This is the perfect use case for the age-old trick of contrasting silhouettes: One element is flowing and oversized while the other is fitted. Wolford Mat De Luxe Shaping Thong BodysuitKobi Halperin Charlize Faux Leather PantsNow 62% OffYves Saint Laurent Uptown Pouch Favorite Daughter The Favorite Pinstripe Blazer Rag & Bone Quinn Mid Chelsea BootsRoxanne Assoulin Square Stone Spaced Chiclet Stretch BraceletNow 30% OffA Coordinating Set GothamIf denim on denim is a Canadian tuxedo, what do we call leather on leather? I’m open to suggestions, but in the meantime, the point remains that coordinating separates is a no-brainer way to look pulled together without putting in that much effort. Alberta Ferretti Buttoned Leather Jacket Alberta Ferretti Stud Pocket Flared TrousersTony Bianco Sheba Whiskey BootsAwe Inspired Mini Athena Pendant Necklace Brunello Cucinelli Monili Envelope Flap Suede Clutch BagBrilliant Earth Toi et Moi Heart and Emerald Cut White Topaz Cocktail RingBlazer + An Edgy Touch MEGAOkay, Kate Hudson! This is a look I could easily see myself wearing. You could certainly style any pair of leather pants with a blazer, but bonus points if you go for something with a bit of extra flair, like her lace-up trousers. Your leather pants don’t have to be black—and I emphasize: You can buy non-black clothes. Is there anything Zendaya looks bad in? The way she wore this lady jacket with a bit of skin showing is a masterclass in sexy yet stylish dressing. It offers a more casual, street style vibe to outfits that might otherwise lack personality. I’m partial to a graphic tee, but rugby shirts or soccer jerseys are very on-trend this year. html:
Is it a hot take to call leather pants a neutral? Even if that’s an unpopular opinion, I’m willing to defend this point until the bitter end. No capsule wardrobe is complete without a pair, and if you don’t yet own one, I’m positive you will be amazed at how easily it can transform your weekly looks.

Paired with a blazer, T-shirt, or even lingerie, I’ve rounded up 11 celebrities as perfect examples of how to style leather pants. Ahead, find all the outfit inspiration—and product recommendations—you need.

A White Top

When in doubt, a white top will always look good with black bottoms. But then again, not any old basics will do. To ensure this doesn’t devolve into a derivative or boring ensemble, look for separates that are luxury-tier quality. Craftsmanship and good design are timeless.

Wolford Beauty Cotton Tank Top

Commando Faux Leather Flared Leg Pants

Golden Goose Debbie Beatles Studded Leather Boots

Balenciaga Genève Large Hobo Bag

Now 30% Off

LAMARQUE Presley Jacket

Ray-Ban Emy Rectangular Sunglasses

A Fitted Bodice + Wide-Leg Pant

Sofía Vergara really did the damn thing here. Immediately, I need a pair of wide-leg leather pants with an elastic waistband for the comfort alone! This is the perfect use case for the age-old trick of contrasting silhouettes: One element is flowing and oversized while the other is fitted.

Wolford Mat De Luxe Shaping Thong Bodysuit

Kobi Halperin Charlize Faux Leather Pants

Now 62% Off

Yves Saint Laurent Uptown Pouch

Favorite Daughter The Favorite Pinstripe Blazer

Rag & Bone Quinn Mid Chelsea Boots

Roxanne Assoulin Square Stone Spaced Chiclet Stretch Bracelet

Now 30% Off

A Coordinating Set

If denim on denim is a Canadian tuxedo, what do we call leather on leather? I’m open to suggestions, but in the meantime, the point remains that coordinating separates is a no-brainer way to look pulled together without putting in that much effort.

Alberta Ferretti Buttoned Leather Jacket

Alberta Ferretti Stud Pocket Flared Trousers

Tony Bianco Sheba Whiskey Boots

Awe Inspired Mini Athena Pendant Necklace

Brunello Cucinelli Monili Envelope Flap Suede Clutch Bag

Brilliant Earth Toi et Moi Heart and Emerald Cut White Topaz Cocktail Ring

Blazer + An Edgy Touch

Okay, Kate Hudson! This is a look I could easily see myself wearing. You could certainly style any pair of leather pants with a blazer, but bonus points if you go for something with a bit of extra flair, like her lace-up trousers.

Lafayette 148 New York Satin Peak Lapel Blazer

AGGI by HALEWSKI Jo Rich Black Vegan Leather Pants

Alaïa Cœur Slingback Pumps

Jacquemus Le Bandeau Pralu Ribbed-Knit Crop Top

Nadri Love All Cubic Zirconia Tennis Necklace

Chanel Le Vernis Longwear Nail Color

A Pop of Color

Maybe you would rather not leave the house in head-to-toe fire engine red (but if you do, we have some inspiration for you there, too), but there’s a lesson to be learned here, I swear. Your leather pants don’t have to be black—and I emphasize: You can buy non-black clothes.

L’Agence Chamberlain Blazer

L’Agence Clayton Coated Wide-Leg Jean

Black Suede Studio Lou 50 Pump

Frame Relaxed Blue Striped Shirt

Now 60% Off

Khaite x Oliver Peoples Beveled Acetate Rectangle Sunglasses

Akris Anna Medium Leather Hobo Bag

Sharp & Sculptural Lines

Ugh, the perfect specimen. Is there anything Zendaya looks bad in? The way she wore this lady jacket with a bit of skin showing is a masterclass in sexy yet stylish dressing.

Amanda Uprichard Berlin Jacket

Diesel Bootcut Pants

Christian Louboutin Condora Pointed Toe Bootie

Nadri Leah Pavé Cage Ear Crawlers

NOOD The Game Changer Lift & Shape Bra

Lelet NY Tera Petite Ponytail Cuff

Dressed Down with a Tee

One of my go-to dressing formulas is adding a T-shirt to almost any bottom. It offers a more casual, street style vibe to outfits that might otherwise lack personality. I’m partial to a graphic tee, but rugby shirts or soccer jerseys are very on-trend this year.

Ambush Striped Rugby Shirt

Now 40% Off

Victoria Beckham Alina High-Rise Leather Bootcut Pants

Proenza Schouler XL Ruched Tote Bag

Banbe Miranda Sunnies

Justine Clenquet Dana Necklace

Prada Pop Strings Bag Charm

Classic Black and White

I touched on black and white for Bella Hadid’s look earlier, but here is another fantastic example from Heidi Klum. While Bella’s look is better suited for weekends or after-hours, this option is ideal for work.

The Frankie Shop Bea Oversized Suiting Blazer

Tuckernuck Scoop Neck Tee

Proenza Schouler White Label Lightweight Leather Culottes

Reformation Rosina Ankle Boot

Anya Hindmarch Mortimer Top Handle

Their 14k Sutton Oval Locket

Accessorize, Accessorize, Accessorize

Of course, Cynthia Erivo made sure to have some emerald green accents. She is nothing if not consistent. The combination of this sweater and these trousers stands out to me for the laidback, boyfriend fit they provide. The jewelry, hat, nails, and mega-platform heels spice things up.

Chanel Joan Elkayam Buckled Baker Boy Hat

Miu Miu Wool and Cashmere Sweater

Now 98% Off

Mother Denim The Half-Pipe Cargo Nerdy

Gucci Horsebit Platform Loafer Slingback

Georg Jensen Arc Ear Cuff

Shashi Paloma Earring

With Something Sexy

Looking for date night outfit inspiration? Or maybe you’re still not sure of what you’re wearing for Valentine’s Day. You can thank Sydney Sweeney for this bright idea. Few pairings are sexier than leather and lace.

Nour Hammour Drey The It Girl Jacket

Now 50% Off

Fleur du Mal Bianca Lace Bodysuit

L’Agence Livvy Leather Trouser

Khaite Davis Boot

Prada Signature Rectangle Sunglasses

Loewe Mini Flamenco Clutch

A Long Coat + Turtleneck

Last but certainly not least, I had to include an option for my capsule wardrobe dressers. I’ll say it again: Leather pants are neutral! As such, they look amazing with fellow staple items, such as a knit turtleneck and a trench coat.

Theory Oversized Double-Breasted Trench Coat

Simkhai Katy Turtleneck Sweater

Agolde ’90s Pinch Waist Long

Larroudé Anne Boot

Khaite Lina Crossbody Bag

Chimi 11 Tortoise Sunglasses

Why Trust ELLE

Every product featured on ELLE.com is independently researched, tested, or editor-approved. We only recommend products that we stand behind, and the merchandise featured on our site is always driven by editorial and product testing standards, not by affiliate deals or advertising relationships. Any content created in partnership with advertisers is marked as such.
